# GitBook Documentation Branch

This file will be copied to the `gitbook-docs` branch to explain the setup.

## About this branch

The `gitbook-docs` branch contains the **generated** GitBook-compatible documentation for this project. This branch is automatically updated by GitHub Actions whenever changes are pushed to the `main` branch.

**Do not edit this branch manually** - all changes will be overwritten by the automated build process.

## Structure

- All files from `docs/` are copied here
- API documentation in `api/` is automatically generated from Python docstrings
- The structure is defined in `SUMMARY.md`

## How it works

1. When code is pushed to `main`, the GitHub Actions workflow runs
2. The `scripts/convert_to_gitbook.py` script converts `::: module` syntax to plain Markdown
3. All documentation files are copied to this branch
4. GitBook syncs with this branch to display the documentation

## Viewing the documentation

The live documentation is available at: [https://mozilla-ai.github.io/any-agent/](https://mozilla-ai.github.io/any-agent/)

## Making changes

To modify the documentation:

1. Edit files in the `docs/` directory on the `main` branch
2. For API documentation, update the docstrings in the Python source code
3. Commit and push to `main`
4. The workflow will automatically update this branch

## Configuration

- `.gitbook.yaml` - GitBook configuration (on main branch)
- `SUMMARY.md` - Table of contents structure
- `scripts/convert_to_gitbook.py` - Documentation generation script (on main branch)
